Description: Fragment of pottery amphora, rim; whitish-yellow stripe on top of rim; two narrow white stripes outside and below the rim; white wavy line on neck. Hard, fine, red clay, Munsell 2.5YR 5/6 (red), light grey core, many white inclusions and a few dark ones; silver mica.
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 335)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
